name: Cozy Bedrooms in Oakridge, Vancouver West
description: Understated rooms with Wi-Fi in a relaxed guesthouse featuring a shared kitchenette & a terrace.

owner.name: Cozy Bedrooms in Oakridge, Vancouver West (Owner)

address: Cozy Bedrooms in Oakridge, Vancouver West, 56 W 41st Ave, Vancouver, BC V5Y 2R9

featured_reviews.review_id: I've only been here for a couple hrs... Had a nice shower and relaxing on a comfortable bed in my normal sized bedroom. Lots of closet space, a heater, snacks, waters, a large window, extra plug-ins with a power bar, hangers and shelves, blinds and curtains if ya want it dark! There's a desk to work at if needed, two lamps and ceiling light! So far, so good! Will prolly sleep good tonite!!

featured_reviews.review_id: Fang Dong Shi Wei Ci Xiang De A Yi ,Ren Hen nice,Ke Xi Mei Neng Duo He Ta Liao Liao Tian ,Huan Jing Hen Hao
featured_reviews.review_text: Fang Dong Shi Wei Ci Xiang De A Yi ,Ren Hen nice,Ke Xi Mei Neng Duo He Ta Liao Liao Tian ,Huan Jing Hen Hao

featured_reviews.review_id:
Like many I missed the shared bathroom 'feature' on the Hotels.com site, but looking beyond that the host is very welcoming and the place is kept immaculately clean. Even my single room was spacious enough. The kitchenette comes well equipped with hob, fridge and microwave. Crockery and cutlery is also supplied. There's also a common kitchen upstairs. A TV in the room would have been preferred.

If you are a pedestrian then location could be a challenge.  Like many areas of Vancouver redevelopment is killing the local stores and supermarkets so you need to travel further. A 10 minute walk takes you to excellent transit options. A car would open up even more choice.

Not remotely accessible due to being an older home.

featured_reviews.review_id: The stay was satisfying ) I got access to all the necessary kitchen facilities and other crucial staff needed for a comfortable stay. The Hotel's manager is hospital and friendly. The location of the Hotel is in the hurt of Vancouver. Therefore I can recommend this Hotel for long as well as short stays.

featured_reviews.review_id: Clean, tidy and the bed was quite comfortable. The owner was very nice and helpful. Very nice lady. I did stay  one night with my daughter. This place did satisfy my expectations and I really recommend it for any stay in Vancouver. The kitchen was shared with two other rooms, but me and my daughter had dinner out and left before breakfast. It is close to the sky train, bus, and Oakridge mall is a 7 minute walk. It's also close to a beautiful park. I will definitely be coming back to stay!

featured_reviews.review_id: The owner Maria was very gracious, friendly  and helpful & made my stay very comfortable. The #1room was very clean and spacious. The shared modern kitchen area came with kitchen gadgets. The location is very near to Oakridge station, mall & supermarket - a walking distance. Returning, for sure

featured_reviews.review_id: It's clean, the owner is friendly and helpful. I rented a room because I needed a place to study for a whole night and it was super quiet and close to my College.
